reasoning: BAC represents approximately 3-4% of all lung cancers. With global lung cancer incidence of ~23 per 100k (GLOBOCAN 2005), BAC incidence estimated at ~0.8 per 100k. Moderate confidence due to subtype-specific extrapolation.
source: Parkin DM et al. (2005). Global cancer statistics, 2002. CA Cancer J Clin. 55(2):74-108
